body.name: Elrene Home Fashions Brighton Windowpane Plaid Blackout Window Curtain, Living Room and Bedroom Drape with Rod Pocket Tabs, 52" x 95", Indigo, 1 Panel

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Elrene Home Fashions Store

body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: BLACKOUT WINDOW PANEL: Embrace modern farmhouse style with the Brighton Windowpane Plaid Blackout Single Window Curtain. Get country-chic decor with sun protection in each blackout panel.
RUSTIC PATTERN & DESIGN: A distressed plaid grid on a linen-blend ground completes this modern farmhouse window panel. You’ll get room-darkening perks, rich texture, and a luxurious dry hand.

HIGH-QUALITY HOME DECOR: Made from a poly/linen blend, the panel’s blackout lining effectively reduces noise and light. These linen curtains have 3-inch rod pocket and back tab hanging options that fit up to a 1-inch-diameter curtain rod.
FASHIONABLE & EASY CARE: Great looks meet easy care with this lovely curtain. Each window panel requires only a simple machine wash to stay stylish and beautiful.

FOUR GENERATIONS OF QUALITY & FASHION: Elrene Home Fashions has been designing and producing high-quality home decor since 1922. We focus on creating decorator looks and exciting designs for your home.
body.description: Elrene Home Fashions provides beautifully fashionable home decor to suit any decorating taste. Capture that modern farmhouse style with the Elrene Home Fashions Brighton Windowpane Plaid Blackout Window Curtain for your bedroom, living room, kitchen, or office. Easy to hang, this panel has 3-inch rod pocket and back tab hanging options that will fit up to a 1-inch-diameter curtain rod. This single drape features a distressed windowpane plaid grid on a linen-blend ground. The modern rustic slub-weave fabric has visible linen flecks for a natural look and supreme texture.Add to the beauty and farm style of any room while controlling how much light you let in. The inner lining of this lovely single panel reduces light, sound, and temperature, making it ideal for bedrooms or to protect furniture from sun and heat exposure. High-quality material makes this curtain a must-have for your home. Made from a durable poly/linen blend, this curtain is sturdy, hangs beautifully, and has a wonderful rustic texture and thickness to stand up to daily use. Simple care means a machine wash is all that is needed to keep this drape looking amazing. This curtain is a worthy investment for your home and is available in multiple sizes.Established in 1922, Elrene Home Fashions was founded on the principles of quality and guaranteed satisfaction. With the help of our expert artists and designers, we produce high-quality, fashionable home decor for every home and decorating palate. We are 100% committed to our customers and strive to give the very best in all of our products.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Elrene Home Fashions Brighton Windowpane Plaid Blackout Window Curtain Panels offer a perfect solution to how to dress your windows in modern luxury. Designed with a soft, luxurious drape, these casual yet chic window panels feature a distressed windowpane plaid grid in four classic colors and provide blackout benefits making them the perfect addition to any room such as bedrooms, living rooms, nurseries, home offices, basements and more! Slub weave fabrication has visible linen flecks for a natural, textured look. Opaque fabric blocks out light, noise and helps insulate windows. Featuring a sewn in gray blackout liner crafted from 100% polyester, the Brighton curtain prevents most light from entering windows to help darken any room for your best sleep. Hang the curtain panels from the back tabs for an elegant pleated style or use the rod pocket to create a more casual gathered look. Pair with our Elrene Home Fashion window hardware for a coordinated look (sold separately).

Premium Quality Linen Blend Fabric Crafted using a high quality, durable poly-linen blend, the Brighton curtain panels' texture has a rich, luxurious hand and soft drape - perfect for adding an elevated look to any space. Blackout Benefits Featuring a sewn in gray blackout liner crafted from 100% polyester, the Brighton curtain prevents most light from entering windows to help darken any room for your best sleep. Ideal for bedrooms, living rooms, nurseries, and home offices. Easy Care, Machine Washable Easy to care for, the Brighton panels are machine washable! Simply wash with cold water on a gentle cycle, tumble dry on low, and cool iron as needed to remove any stubborn creases and keep your curtains wrinkle free. Colors for Every Style Featuring a distressed windowpane plaid grid in four classic colors, Linen, Gray, Black, and Navy, over an off-white linen ground, the Brighton Collection is sure to complement every décor style from farmhouse cottage to Scandinavian modern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my baby boy's room
reviews.reviewText: These are beautiful. I used in my baby boy's room which is pretty sunny. The blackout perfectly work for afternoon naps. Plus, great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price; really look nice!
reviews.reviewText: These are linen like window pane pattern curtains that once steamed the wrinkles out, look really nice especially for the price. I have been viewing instagram decor influencers for a while now looking for affordable window coverings. These did not disappoint. They are also lined, which is another reason I’m giving a high rating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful curtains! The material is great and the colors were exactly what I wanted. They aren’t completely black out, but I didn’t need them for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look great, block well
reviews.reviewText: They have function and look great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These curtains are made well and look beautiful. One star off because they’re not truly blackout, but they do a good enough job for my daughter’s nursery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these curtains for my salon, I wanted the creamy white color with the blacks check but also wanted the lining so not too sheer. These were better than an expected.! They are very nice, heavy curtains and well lined. They arrived neatly packed with very few wrinklesl. I only had to hang and steam a little. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased several pair of these when they were on a slight sale to hang in my dining and living rooms. I needed a neutral colored and light blocking drape that looked nice. These fit that bill. They come in a few different shades and are fully lined. They are not total are plenty of black out for watching TV. Somehow I seem have totally mismeasured the dining room so I had to purchase rings with clips to make them longer. (I could have let down the hem but I wanted a nice looking easier option. I hope I don't have the same issue in living room because it is way too late to return. Overall, I am deliriously happy with the color, print, light block and quality. I haven't washed so I can't comment on that. I will revisit this review, if I can, when it comes time to wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely product, well made!
reviews.reviewText: Haven't hung these yet but they came in as promised! Can't wait to see them up
Get compliments on these all the time. I absolutely love them, and they do darken the room when closed. Love the pattern and great material. Thick and lined. The best addition to our office.
Sur la photo il y a deux rideaux, le colis n'en contient qu'un. Ce n'est pas très clair c'est dommage. Sinon le rideau est doublé et rend très bien, il a l'air solide.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks like a good quality product if they had sent the write colour. Ordered black and got blue

Advertisement says “blackout”This is not a blockout curtain using in my baby’s room and definitely need a blockout curtain. Lots of light still comes in even with my blockout roller blind behind this curtain.If you don’t want a BLOCKOUT Curtain I would say the made and material is nice, fast shipping to Australia but then I would argue the price point

reviews.reviewTitle: These are great for my sons room
reviews.reviewText: They are made of great material. They don't do completely black out but they have a great design
